title: So Yesu Fa Ho, B're a Koma

lines: So Yesu fa ho, b're a koma
B're a nnesoa ne dadwen hyɛ me so,
Na kwan no ayɛ brɛ nko no?
Yiw, ɔfa ho, minim no saa;
Nna no yɛ ɔbrɛ na 'nadwo yi hu a,
So Yesu fa ho, b're a sum ne
S'ro ne hu hyɛ me kwan ma no?
Sɛ adekyee hann dan 'nadwo sum a,
Ͻfa Ne ho sɛ ɔbɛn me?
So Yesu fa ho, b're a me ne
Na me koma di awerɛhow no?
So ɛfa Ne ho, na Ohu?
